mapper.insert: insert into tabDIYTable4767 (ID, iOrd, F93655, F93656, F93657, F93658, F93659, F93660, F93661, F93662, F93663, F93664, F93665, F93666, F93667, F93668, F93669, F93670, F93671, F93672) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{iord,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{f93655,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{f93656,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{f93657,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{f93658,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{f93659,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{f93660,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{f93661,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{f93662,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{f93663,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{f93664,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{f93665,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{f93666,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{f93667,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{f93668,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{f93669,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{f93670,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{f93671,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{f93672,jdbcType=NVARCHAR})
mapper.select:
select a.F93654 as subject, b.F93656 as fillInType, b.F93657 as formName, b.F93658 as fillInCycle, b.F93659 as reportName, b.F93660 as startDate, b.F93661 as endDate, b.F93662 as fillInWay, b.F93663 as hierarchy, b.F93664 as factoryCode, b.F93665 as workShop, b.F93666 as fillInPrincipal, b.F93668 as fillInNo, b.F93669 as platePrincipal, b.F93670 as plateNo, b.F93671 as monitorPrincipal, b.F93672 as monitorNo from Tabdiytable4766 a left join Tabdiytable4767 b on a.iOrd=b.iOrd and a.id=b.id
(b.F93658='按需' or b.F93658='每天') or b.F93660= case when b.F93658='年' then concat('每年',#{month},'月',#{day},'号') when b.F93658='月' then concat('每月',#{day},'号') when b.F93658='周' then concat('每',#{weekString}) end

select a.F93654 as subject, b.F93656 as fillInType, b.F93657 as formName, b.F93658 as fillInCycle, b.F93659 as reportName, b.F93660 as startDate, b.F93661 as endDate, b.F93662 as fillInWay, b.F93663 as hierarchy, b.F93664 as factoryCode, b.F93665 as workShop, b.F93666 as fillInPrincipal, b.F93668 as fillInNo, b.F93669 as platePrincipal, b.F93670 as plateNo, b.F93671 as monitorPrincipal, b.F93672 as monitorNo from Tabdiytable4766 a left join Tabdiytable4767 b on a.iOrd=b.iOrd and a.id=b.id
(b.F93658='按需' or b.F93658='每天') and case when b.F93658='年' then
and b.F93661=concat('每年',#{month},'月',#{day},'日')
case when b.F93658='月' then
and b.F93661=concat('每月',#{day},'号')
case when b.F93658='周' then
and b.F93661 like concat('%每',#{weekString},'%')
else 1=1 end

select a.F93654 as subject, b.F93656 as fillInType, b.F93657 as formName, b.F93658 as fillInCycle, b.F93659 as reportName, b.F93660 as startDate, b.F93661 as endDate, b.F93662 as fillInWay, b.F93663 as hierarchy, b.F93664 as factoryCode, b.F93665 as workShop, b.F93666 as fillInPrincipal, b.F93668 as fillInNo, b.F93669 as platePrincipal, b.F93670 as plateNo, b.F93671 as monitorPrincipal, b.F93672 as monitorNo from Tabdiytable4766 a left join Tabdiytable4767 b on a.iOrd=b.iOrd and a.id=b.id
(b.F93658='按需' or b.F93658='每天') case when b.F93658='年' then and b.F93661=concat('每年',#{month},'月',#{day},'日') case when b.F93658='月' then and b.F93661=concat('每月',#{day},'号') case when b.F93658='周' then and b.F93661 like concat('%每',#{weekString},'%') else and 1=1 end
